text: Kendall Stephen Chinn (19 October 1962 â€“ 16 July 2020) was a Canadian punk rock lead vocalist and artist. He was best known, under the pseudonym Mr. Chi Pig. He was the lead singer of the band SNFU. Chinn died on 16 July 2020 in Vancouver, British Columbia, aged 57.Edmonton-born SNFU frontman Ken Chinn (aka Mr. Chi Pig) dead at age 57 ==References== Category:1962 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Canadian rock singers Category:People from Edmonton
title: Ken Chinn
